text: Chrysolina sanguinolenta is a species of leaf beetle native to Europe.Fauna EuropaeaWarchalowski, A. (2003) Chrysomelidae. The Leaf-beetles of Europe and the Mediterranean Area. Warsawa: Natura Optima Dux. ==References== ==External links== *Images representing Chysolina at BOLD Category:Chrysomelidae Category:Beetles described in 1758 Category:Beetles of Europe Category:Taxa named by Carl Linnaeus
title: Chrysolina sanguinolenta
